location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 63 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, Keshem [Qeshm] Roads to William Newnham, the Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reporting that one of the Imam of Muscat's sailors had been severely wounded during the firing of a salute and that Colonel Stannus had requested that Captain Charles Maillard accomodate the injured man and his attendents en route to Bombay.
